title: Bad Gateway
detail: DigitalMailSender error: {detail=[invalid_token_response] An error occurred while attempting to retrieve the OAuth 2.0 Access Token Response: I/O error on POST request for "https://3rdpart.for.digitalmail.com/v2/auth": PKIX path building failed: sun.security.provider.certpath.SunCertPathBuilderException: unable to find valid certification path to requested target, status=500 Internal Server Error, title=Internal Server Error}
